channel.title: Addition to the UI for noobs
channel.description: Id love to see a tool that would let you import your class ability log into a diary (Mostly for those too lazy to keep a diary, or the new people who dont know how). Something new people or lazy people can click to just import what info they got off whatever they did the last night. Dunno how useful it would be, but the biggest complaint I see around is "Why dont you use a diary damnit?!".

item.title: Addition to the UI for noobs
item.dc:creator: Sharvax
item.description:
Really? Because the form I just laid out didnt have any information on WHO the obs visited or WHO visited HIM. All it told was that he watched them, and they visited and were visited once. That gives a basic amount of information while still making written logs a must, and still making the quick log useful to people who DONT write diaries.

Why is this such a big deal? You and I BOTH know some people are too lazy to write diaries. You and I also both probably get very upset over people who wont write one. This is the best of both worlds.

Or you can maybe try to improve my idea instead of just saying it wont work? Or come up with your own?

And hell if its just the matter of the quick log becoming standard, Why not allow for unseen classes to have access to a format quick log to make whatever will they want then?

item.title: Addition to the UI for noobs
item.dc:creator: Sharvax
item.description:
For example, If I was Observer and I watched #7 last night - Who then visited #9. And he was also visited by #11

The quick log could say

I watched #7 (Generic Name) last night. #7 visited 1 person and was visited by 1 person.

The written log by the player could say

n1 - #7 - Visited #9, Was visited by #11

Which one has more info? The written log. But the other log is still useful for council if someone doesnt write a diary

item.title: Addition to the UI for noobs
item.dc:creator: Sharvax
item.description:
Im not saying that this should be a REQUIREMENT for people, just a quick post option for lazy people. Make it have less info than normal, but a basic log of what happens last night. That way the ones who write a REAL diary have an advantage, yet theres still info for the ones who dont write it.

It would also make it easier to fake a log for the MM and unseen if they can pretend to use a basic “quick” log.
